game.title: Find the AncientArtifact
game.objective: Locate and obtain the ancient artifact hidden inside the mysterious cave.
game.description: Legend tells of a powerful artifact hidden away in a cave guarded by mythical creatures. Your task is to find this artifact and bring it back.

task.description: Travel to the mentioned location and find the entrance to the cave.
Defeat all the guardians protecting the entrance of the cave.
Explore the cave, solve the puzzles and find the, rumored-to-be powerful ancient artifact.
